bio:
Valie was an Altmer mage and thief whose corpse can be found on top of a table inside the Alftand Animonculory.
Valie was from Windhelm and part of the Eastmarch Crime Faction. She was in an expedition group with J'darr, J'zhar, Umana, Sulla, Yag gra-Gortwog, and Endrast. The group was forced to enter the ruins due to a storm. Inside, she was abducted and killed by the Falmer.
name: Valie
